text: Enemies, A Love Story is a 1989 American romantic drama movie directed by Paul Mazursky and based on the 1966 novel Enemies, A Love Story () by Isaac Bashevis Singer. It stars Anjelica Huston, Ron Silver, Lena Olin, Margaret Sophie Stein, Alan King and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for three Academy Awards in 1990. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1989 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Mazursky
title: Enemies, A Love Story (movie)
